title: SCREEN JUDDER WITH LOCKED CAMERA ENABLED
body:
I use space bar to lock my camera a lot in game, probably 50% of the time...
Since a few patches ago there has been a kinda of small jitter when the camera focuses on your champion when moving. This makes the text of your name look fuzzy and jittery.

Since 2 days ago the problem seems to have become much worse, when i lock camera and issue movement commands the screen can judder sharply moving and snapping back into place briefly. This is quite uncomfortable visually too look at and makes the camera tracking really rough.

I have a 144hz monitor with frame rate unlocked, i remember when i bought this for xmas, the motion was REALLLLY smooth when i locked down the camera. Now it basically vibrates, and the panning motion looks messy.

Ive tried v-sync enabled and disabled...changed res... same problems...

Any ideas?

replies.body:
Let's first make sure that your config isn't the culprit here, in case of some corruption.  Try resetting it to see if that helps.

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Test it in a custom game and let me know!
